posts.post_content:
Hi everyone, I’d like to add a T204 Ramly to my personal collection.  Any common would do.  I’d prefer something in the 2-3 range, preferably centered and crease free.  

EDIT - Found one.  Thanks to everyone for their help/offers!

Thanks,
Anthony
I have a t204 graded #2 for sale, has one soft corner but shows really well. I'm asking $350 or best offer.
Thanks for the pic and offer - PM sent
